services.title: Grooming
services.description: Serviço de banho e tosa profissional.
services.alt: A smiling young woman with long dark hair in a bright yellow shirt cuddles a small fluffy dog against a vibrant turquoise background.

services.title: Boarding
services.description: Hotelzinho para o seu pet com todo o conforto.
services.alt: A woman wearing sunglasses stands in an outdoor dog play area, surrounded by several dogs of different breeds and sizes, with a small plastic slide and a chain-link fence visible in the background.

services.title: Veterinary
services.alt: A smiling male veterinarian in a white coat, with a stethoscope around his neck, holds a light-brown dog in a clinic setting, with a patterned wall hanging in the background.

services.title: Training
services.description: Treinamento e adestramento para cães de todas as idades.
services.alt: A tan and white dog indoors, intently focused on three upside-down cups on a wooden floor, while a person’s hand moves one of the cups. Shelving and furniture are visible in the background.

services.title: Adoption
services.description: Encontre seu novo amigo de quatro patas.
services.alt: A white dog wearing a blue collar sits inside a large, arched dog house painted in rainbow colors, with some loose fur on the floor in front, all set against a plain white background.
